definition: public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Receive alarm hind, prefectural public security bureau and department of propaganda of county Party committee undertook checking instantly.
sentences.chinese: 接警后，县公安局与县委宣传部立即进行了核查。

sentences.english: Article 30 The Municipal Public Security Bureau are responsible for the interpretation of the specific application of the present regulations.
sentences.chinese: 第三十条本条例的具体应用问题由市公安局负责解释。

sentences.english: If you want to report the crime to the police, do so.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想到公安局报案，就报吧。

sentences.english: It's not far from here.A taxi can take you there in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 公安局离这不远，乘出租车去只需五分钟。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaojuan is a Jiangyou Police station's ordinary police.
sentences.chinese: 蒋晓娟是江油市公安局的一名普通民警。

sentences.english: Some owners simply think this is for the public security bureaux to make money from us.
sentences.chinese: 一些业主简单地认为这仅仅是公安局从我们身上赚钱。

sentences.english: Public Security officials found this amusing and suggested Li was embezzling money.
sentences.chinese: 公安局的官员觉得这个很好笑，并建议李私吞了钱。

sentences.english: A director general in the police bureau is playing chess with an old man.
sentences.chinese: 一位公安局长在茶馆里与一位老头下棋。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen Jianxin, Deputy director of Panzhihua Public Security Bureau;
sentences.chinese: 市公安局副局长陈建新。

sentences.english: Be that case of the probationer causing somebody slight wound case.
sentences.chinese: 即某市公安局刑侦大队实习生李某致人轻伤案。

sentences.english: Why do I have to obtain and transmit the data to PSB every night?
sentences.chinese: 为什么每天晚上要把数据传输到公安局电脑系统中？

sentences.english: The public security bureau is pressing for a new identity card for inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 公安局正在催办新一代居民身份证。

sentences.english: In this regard, Municipal Public Security Bureau decided to launch a line of concentrated, to crack down.
sentences.chinese: 对此，市公安局决定开展集中行一，进行严厉打击。

sentences.english: The Suichang County police couldn't be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 目前没有办法向遂昌县公安局联络征求意见。

sentences.english: He had been a police commissioner for many years.
Jincheng Municipal Public Security Bureau deputy director Zhao Jianyun said.
sentences.chinese: 晋城市公安局副局长赵建云说。

definition: abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
